item.title: node - localhost connect error ECONNREFUSED ::1:4723 in node 17 and node 18
item.description: The upgrade to node 18 broke some things on CI that looked strange at first: The npx wait-on checks started showing connection errors. The webdriver.io tests for native apps failed, also with connection errors. The errors look like this: Unable to connect to “http://localhost:4723/”, make sure browser driver is running on that address. .. ERROR webdriver: RequestError: connect ECONNREFUSED ::1:4723 The localhost resolves to IPv6 address ::1 and the connection fails as the server (Appium) only runs on IPv4 address (127.
